items.title: Sheriff: Bodycam Footage From Cuyahoga County Deputies Will Now Come Out Within 7 Days
items.description: Policy shift follows a Marshall Project - Cleveland and News 5 Cleveland investigation into the October shooting of a teen by a deputy.

items.title: Law And Disorder: Police Oversight and Training Confront A Changing landscape
items.description: The future of police accountability remains uncertain as misconduct persists and focus shifts from reforms.

items.title: Search Mississippi Criminal Justice Bills as They Move Through the Legislature
items.description: Use our interactive bill tracker to stay informed on changes to courts, policing, prisons and more.

items.title: ‘Sing Sing’ Actor Jon-Adrian ‘JJ’ Velazquez Reflects on the Power of Prison Theater
items.description: JJ Velazquez served nearly 24 years for a murder he didn’t commit. A unique prison arts program transformed him into an actor and activist.

items.title: ‘Fear for Their Lives’: Trans Women Federal Prisoners Told They Will Be Housed With Men
items.description: After a minor change in a judge’s order, the Trump administration arranged to move over a dozen transgender women to men’s facilities.
